ruina:FalsePresent.NAME: False Present
ruina:FalsePresent.FLAVOR: Poor Ozma. She didn't know that lying adults don't approach others without reason.
DESCRIPTIONS: 点最大生命值. 每场战斗你抽到的第 #b
张卡耗能为0直到被打出.

ruina:Prescript.NAME: Prescript
ruina:Prescript.FLAVOR: A set of bizarre instructions. Who in their right mind would come up with these?
DESCRIPTIONS: NL 完成后，变为一件特殊遗物.

ruina:PrescriptsGrace.NAME: Prescript's Grace
ruina:PrescriptsGrace.FLAVOR: It all made sense now. All those pointless endeavours converged onto a single, definite meaning.
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗开始时, 随机从 #y攻击牌, #y技能牌, 和 #y能力牌 中选择. 第一次打出选择的种类的牌时会打出两次.

ruina:Goodbye.NAME: Goodbye
ruina:Goodbye.FLAVOR: It tries to mimic humans. Looking into a mirror, mumbling to itself, trying to fix its skeletal structure . . . it's as if it was trying to become human.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗打出的第一张 #y攻击牌 造成双倍伤害.
